project_name.justification: The text announces the inclusion of a new project: "...a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Monitor Valley North Project."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as: "Fuse Battery Metals Inc. (“the Company“ or “Fuse”) (TSXV:FUSE) (OTC:FUSEF) (FRA:43W3) is pleased to announce expansion of our exploration land holdings with the inclusion of a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Monitor Valley North Project."

ceo_buyer.justification: The text identifies the CEO in multiple places, including: "Interim President & CEO Mr. Tim Fernback has been named Fuse’s permanent President & CEO by the Company’s Board of Directors."

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states that the company will become the full owner, implying 100% interest: "...whereby the Company becomes the legal and beneficial owner of 97 placer claims..."

primary_commodity.justification: The project is explicitly identified as a lithium project: "...a new lithium exploration project in Nevada, the Monitor Valley North Project."

verified_article_link.justification: The article link is not provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The currency for the cash payment is explicitly stated as US dollars: "reimbursing the staking and recording cost of the Vendor in the amount of US$30,081 upon signing the Agreement"

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction terms include a cash reimbursement: "reimbursing the staking and recording cost of the Vendor in the amount of US$30,081 upon signing the Agreement"

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction involves the issuance of shares, but no raw monetary value for the shares is provided.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The cash and share components of the transaction are listed separately, not as a single combined value.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The transaction terms include the issuance of a specific number of shares: "issuing to the Vendor 500,000 fully paid and non-assessable common shares in the capital of the Company upon TSX Venture Exchange acceptance of the transaction."

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: There is no mention of share warrants in the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: There is no mention of options in the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued (500,000), but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.05'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of drilling meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text states an "intention to rapidly evaluate the lithium potential of this project" but does not specify a binding monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction terms do not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The property size is specified in the text: "...owner of 97 placer claims (MVN1 – MVN97) covering approximately 770 hectares of alluvial sediments and clays..."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified as hectares: "...covering approximately 770 hectares of alluvial sediments and clays..."

resource_size.justification: The text states that "Minimal work has been conducted on the project" and that the company intends "to complete an initial NI #43-101 Technical Report on the property in the near future", which implies no formal mineral resource has been defined yet.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer's ticker and exchange are provided in the first paragraph: "Fuse Battery Metals Inc. (“the Company“ or “Fuse”) (TSXV:FUSE)..."
